description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission Ref: 201362HH dated 08.06.2020 for "Part single, part two storey rear extension; alteration of main roof from hip to gable end; roof extension to main rear roof slope incorporating Juliet balcony; installation of three roof lights to front roof slope; single storey front porch extension; construction of Juliet balcony to first floor rear elevation; and alterations to fenestration to first floor north (side) elevation". Amendment seeks to render to south & north elevations and porch extension as per drawings; parapet wall details to ground floor and first floor rear extensions flat roof; small glazing changes to rear and side elevations as per drawings; small modification of porch overhang; relocation of side access door; one air conditioning condenser unit on ground floor extension flat roof as per drawings (at a distance of 7m+ from the boundary line for No. 24 Pierrepoint Road W3 9JH)
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: A101 +A201, A102 + A202, A203, A104 + A204, A105 + A205, A106 + A206, A107 + A207, A108 + A208, A109 + A209, received 04.10.2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
